column3: News;PHNOM PENH: A------ baby was wrapped in black bags and dumped on a patch of wild morning glory in the early hours of 30th October
column10: some youngsters went to the pond to catch fish
column11: and heard the sound of a baby crying. The baby was wrapped in black plastic bags.------The source said that after removing the bag
column12: people took the baby to a private clinic
column13: where it was declared healthy. A 21 year old woman from the area is currently taking care of the infant.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/382807------
